rawLLMResponseText:
Here is a draft marketing email for the banking customer:

Subject: Exclusive Offers for Our Valued LOCATION_0 Customer

Dear PERSON_0,

As one of our most appreciated banking customers in LOCATION_0, we want to celebrate your upcoming birthday on DATE_0 with some special offers tailored just for you.

PERSON_0, you've trusted us to manage your finances, and we're grateful for that. To show our appreciation, we're excited to provide you with the following exclusive birthday rewards:

• $25 Statement Credit: Simply make 5 purchases with your debit or credit card in the month of your birthday, and we'll apply a $25 statement credit to your account.

• Bonus Interest Rate: Open a new high-yield savings account in the month of your birthday, and you'll earn an additional 0.25% APY for the first year.

• Waived Fees: We're waiving all banking fees for new accounts, money transfers, and more during your birthday month.

These special offers are our way of thanking you for your continued loyalty. As a valued female customer, your partnership means everything to us.

To redeem these birthday rewards or explore our latest personal banking services, simply reply to this email or give us a call. Our team is always happy to assist you.

Happy early birthday, PERSON_0! We look forward to many more years of our banking relationship.

Sincerely,
[Your Bank Name]
